entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
